path: artifacts/Neuron Standart Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Neuron-Contracts: contracts/Neuron Standart Smart Contract Security Audit/Neuron-Contracts

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function distribute() in GaugeDistribution contract uses a loop to calculate reward, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long tokens list.
